author: Anonymous Atom
title: problem set 1 q 2
question:
Hi! 
when I run syntax for question 2 it keeps finding error on the part of the code which provide instruction... I figured this would be fine but when I try to run handitin it comes back with a syntax error. Is it possible I have to change what was already written on the assignment?

student_answer:
Hi, try to look for a solution in the video that discusses evaluating complicated problems. It will help you to find the right syntax. 
Try running the file before submitting it. If you submit and there is an error you will get 0.
